description:
Tired of the same old faces on the other
BDSM websites? Well you're at Hogtied now, and we
give you more fresh new faces than any other Bondage
site on the net. Meet Melissa, a cute French girl with an accent to die for. Tough, flexible, and beautiful, this French beauty can take it. I gave her one of my hardest floggings to date. Ever hear a girl cry out in French when she is made to come over and over and over? NO? Well, what are you waiting for?
title: Melissa Lauren
